channel.title: Anyone ever gotten Hybridscape to work?
channel.description: Has anybody ever gotten Hybridscape to work for them? Theres a bug in the savefile, which keeps users from logging on, they just throw an exception and d/c. I tried *coughdecompilingcough* the hybridscape out of Moparscape, and putting the savefile code in there with some modifications, but still no luck.

item.title: Anyone ever gotten Hybridscape to work?
item.dc:creator: @superstuntguy superstuntguy
item.description:
@superstuntguy wrote:

Has anybody ever gotten Hybridscape to work for them?
Theres a bug in the savefile, which keeps users from logging on, they just throw an exception and d/c.
I tried coughdecompilingcough the hybridscape out of Moparscape, and putting the savefile code in there with some modifications, but still no luck.

Read full topic
